message.content:
```python
def transform(sequence):
    first_zero = next(i for i, x in enumerate(sequence) if x == '0')
    last_zero = len(sequence) - next(i for i, x in enumerate(sequence[::-1]) if x == '0') - 1
    return sequence[:first_zero] + '0'*(last_zero-first_zero+1) + sequence[last_zero+1:]
```

```python
def transform(sequence):
    first_zero = next(i for i, x in enumerate(sequence) if x == '0')
    last_zero = len(sequence) - next(i for i, x in enumerate(sequence[::-1]) if x == '0') - 1
    return sequence[:first_zero] + '0'*(last_zero-first_zero+1) + sequence[last_zero+1:]
```
